name: Teleball
description:
In this 2D neon themed arcade game, you have to keep the "Teleball" alive for as long as possible with dexterity and precise timing

Game is in early access so there is still some polishing to come and some new features.

Finally if you encounter anything you believe to be a bug, please report them by messaging me on twitter @AtomicSilverDev

:)

Inquiries:

Twitter: @AtomicSilverDev
